review_data.title: Louis
review_data.content: Pretty good burger joint. Convenient prices considering how expensive the city is. Short waiting time and the food was delicious

review_data.title: Ideal für den kleinen Hunger
review_data.content: Extrem leckeres Rindfleischsandwich mit köstlicher Sauce. Ideal für den kleinen Hunger zwischendurch, als Hauptgericht leider zu wenig.

review_data.title: Einer der Besten Snackcorners der Stadt
review_data.content: Das Louis Take-Away ist seit Jahren meine Anlaufstelle wenn es um einen kleinen Snack spätabends oder zwischendurch geht. Wenn ich...More

review_data.title: Kontrollbesuch - TOP
review_data.content: Hungrig im Niederdorf - kein Problem ! Louis war auch heute wieder eine prima Anlaufstelle mit sehr charmanter, freundlicher Bedienung...More

review_data.title: Best burger joint in town
review_data.content: If you’re in need of a juicy burger this is the best joint in town prices are good and the homemade sauce is perfect.

review_data.title: Best food for a great price
review_data.content: During our 4 day stay in Zurich we dined here 3 times due to the fact that the price was very reasonable but more important the food was very good and tasty. Small menu yet quality food. Claire was very professional, warm and friendly. We...More

review_data.title: First Lunch in Zürich
review_data.content: We arrived on the train from Basel around lunch time so we decided to walk around in a rainy day in Zürich to find a place grab a quick lunch and stumbled on to Louis! Pleasant surprise, sat outside and had wine and shared an...More

review_data.title: klein aber fein

review_data.title: Nachmittagsspaziergang mit kleinem stop...
review_data.content: Sehr leckeres Baguette mit Rindfleisch und Lamm. Für 11.- & 11.50 absolut in Ordnung. Kann ich jedem empfehlen der den...More

review_data.title: Delicious burgers
review_data.content: This place is a little gem! And it overs substantially better take away food than every other take away in Niederdorf. And on a cold night it's kept nice and warm by lots of over head heating, it was gloriously warm! Can't wait to go...More

review_data.title: Spitzen Imbiss mit angemessenem Preis
review_data.content: Ein frisch bereitetes Baguette mit Steak und Zutaten nach Wunsch für 11 CHF - fair für Zürich und selbst Qualität...More

review_data.title: Tasty big burgers at a good price
review_data.content: Very nice and filling Burgers at a reasonable price for a good fast food fix. They also do Sandwiches which look very good too.

review_data.title: Quick meal
review_data.content: On our way home after a big walk we were starving. Thus we stopped by at Louis to take a bite.We ate a pork steak sandwitch and a beef burger. They were totally delicious !! I fondly recommend it guys.

review_data.title: Fresh fast food meal
review_data.content: Hungry on return from touring. Needed a quick meal. Most filling lamb or chicken in roll, freshly prepared in your presence. Was also amazed at their veg brinjal preparation. Close to hotel wellenberg

review_data.title: Delicious
review_data.content: Not sure what they do to the fries but they are amazing. We got burgers and fries. No clue what the non-spicy sauce is but it’s delicious.

review_data.title: Excellent!

review_data.title: Nice burgers and fries!
